member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_PRELOAD
member.summary: Defines preload hints for the Media Engine. These values correspond to the preload attribute of the HTMLMediaElement interface in HTML5.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_PRELOAD.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_PRELOAD_EMPTY
member.summary: The preload attribute is an empty string. This value is equivalent to MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_PRELOAD_AUTOMATIC.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_PRELOAD.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_PRELOAD_NONE
member.summary: The preload attribute is "none". This value is a hint to the user agent not to preload the resource.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_PRELOAD.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_PRELOAD_METADATA
member.summary: The preload attribute is "metadata". This value is a hint to the user agent to fetch the resource metadata.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_PRELOAD.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_PRELOAD_AUTOMATIC
member.summary: The preload attribute is "auto". This value is a hint to the user agent to preload the entire resource.
